Tiege Hanley CLAY MASK

Brand: Tiege Hanley

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Kaolin, Charcoal, Butylene Glycol, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Bisabolol, Allantoin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Ethylhexylglycerin

erin

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
